interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly…
Review Date: 2020/10/07
Store: Biutee
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is just the poly gel. In order to use this for long nails you need nail forms, a solution, a container for the solution, and the brush with scrapper, and the UV lamp. Also the base coat and most likely a nail drill and some nails files (not shown in picture). ***Important*** You have to use a gel nail base coat before the poly gel in order for it to stick, otherwise they will pop off. If you don’t have these things, I would suggest you don’t get this for the first time. There are nail kits for that. And lots of YouTube videos to show how to do it. It’s how I learned to do mine. With a full set of long nails, and enough for extra nails and some fills, this one bottle could last for at least a couple months. This is a good amount of product for a reasonable price. $7 for nails for a couple months. And this nice color looks beautiful. It’s hardy nails like acrylic and gel nail polish in one.
Review Title: Beautiful saloon nails
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
96 Pieces Glossy False Nails Oval Rhinestone Full Cover False Nails Pink Color Changing Gradient Short Artificial Nail Tips with 4 Pieces Nail Glue for Women Girls Nail DIY Decorations BBTO {'Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'BBTO', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Number of Pieces': '4, 96', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 7.32 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces'} You get what you pay for. The nails are pretty thin and that’s only alright for the short length, not medium which these are. There is only enough nails in each set for me to get both hands once. The others are wasted. I put the gradient color on first as it was the least trouble for this mommy of 4. All the others would REQUIRE a clear top coat. Jus touching the gold glitter n it started coming off. This gradient color could use a top coat to help it last longer but it’s fine. And before asking, I didnt bother trying the nail glue it comes with. If the nails aren’t great I wouldn’t trust the glue. For my regular fake nails I will stick with my short rounded French tips that are thicker and more durable than these. If I want something with color for a night or 2, I might put one of the others on. While I probably won’t buy these ever again they aren’t bad, jus not that good either to waste more of my money for another batch.
Edited review update: last pic is of my broken nail. It lasted 5 hours. Then I trimmed all my nails down n 5 more nails went the following day. There is no salvaging them either. It all split down the middle n not a small split either. It went almost through n just fell apart. And so I drop my ratings from 3 stars to 1. If I could give 0, I would. Cheap and that’s the quality too DROP THE BOMB Bbosong Sun Stick SPF50+ PA++++ 15g - Oil Free UVA/UVB Protection Sebum Control Skin Smooth Moisturizing Sunblock Stick Balm without Sticky, Primer before Makeup DROP THE BOMB {'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Item Weight': '15 Grams', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'DROP THE BOMB', 'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 0.53 Ounces'} When they say hypoallergenic, reef friendly, made with vegan ingredients, and calming natural ingredients I think it must be okay to order. But they don’t list their ingredients so I wasn’t sure if I should. And now I know why they don’t. I posted a picture of the ingredients if you would like to look them up yourself. The top half of the ingredients which take up most of what it is made of is made of: polyethylene(man made plastic), a chemical, acrylic or plexiglass, a few man made silicones, and chemical fragrances(some of them are really long words so I just put down the laymans terms.) I stopped looking it up at that point. I’m not putting this on as I’m allergic to a few of the ingredients. Hope this helps. They don’t list ingredients but I have a picture of it Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} I use these with my micellar water for my makeup removal and it works great. It was really easy to hand wash. I love that it comes with its own laundry bag if I choose to throw it in the washer. 18 pack, for the price ($10) is a steal! So soft and easy to hand wash Amtidy Solid Color Vintage Modern Style Elastic Women's Rhinestone Crown Tiara, Bridal Wedding Dance Party Birthday Party Women's Headband Tiara, Queen Tiara With Comb（Silver） Amtidy {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Amtidy', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.65 x 5.63 x 3.23 inches; 12.03 Ounces', 'UPC': '782931993780'} I use these to get my hair out of the way for washing my face, gym time, and just to wear out. Variety of colors make it easy to match to my clothes. Fits my head good and stays on. Good variety of color Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly… Biutee {'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} This is just the poly gel. In order to use this for long nails you need nail forms, a solution, a container for the solution, and the brush with scrapper, and the UV lamp. Also the base coat and most likely a nail drill and some nails files (not shown in picture). ***Important*** You have to use a gel nail base coat before the poly gel in order for it to stick, otherwise they will pop off. If you don’t have these things, I would suggest you don’t get this for the first time. There are nail kits for that. And lots of YouTube videos to show how to do it. It’s how I learned to do mine. With a full set of long nails, and enough for extra nails and some fills, this one bottle could last for at least a couple months. This is a good amount of product for a reasonable price. $7 for nails for a couple months. And this nice color looks beautiful. It’s hardy nails like acrylic and gel nail polish in one. profile:
**User Profile Summary (Updated):**

- **Nail Product Preferences:** User prefers short, durable nails with rounded French tips, focusing on quality and thickness in artificial nails for longevity. They are open to colorful options for special occasions, prioritizing practicality and quality finishes like gradients and glitter.

- **Style:** The user seeks a balance between vibrant designs and reliable products, ensuring flair does not compromise performance.

- **Quality Concerns:** Dissatisfaction with previous purchases lacking durability has influenced their ratings negatively.

- **DIY Approach:** Enjoying hands-on nail care, they value convenience and ease of application, especially for at-home designs.

- **Budget Awareness:** The user is mindful of value and cautious about investing in products that may not meet expectations, often seeking cost-effective solutions.

- **Ingredient Sensitivity:** They prefer natural and hypoallergenic formulas, especially in skincare, due to allergies.

- **Family Life Impact:** A busy lifestyle with children necessitates manageable and reliable beauty solutions.

- **New Preference:** Recently, the user has emphasized a strong appreciation for reusable products to simplify their routine, reflecting a commitment to sustainability alongside practicality.

- **Hair Care Focus:** They appreciate practical hair accessories that ensure reliability and functionality, as seen in their recent purchase of a versatile headband, valuing variety in hair care items.

Overall, practicality, quality, ingredient transparency, and ease of use remain central to the user’s beauty and personal care approach, with a newfound interest in versatile DIY solutions.
